[source, python]
----
resp = client.search(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "categories": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "category.keyword",
                "size": 5,
                "order": {
                    "total_revenue": "desc"
                }
            },
            "aggs": {
                "total_revenue": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "taxful_total_price"
                    }
                },
                "avg_order_value": {
                    "avg": {
                        "field": "taxful_total_price"
                    }
                },
                "total_items": {
                    "sum": {
                        "field": "total_quantity"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
----
